abilities.name: Skulking Horrors
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

abilities.name: Bounding Leap
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Scouts 8"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 8" before the first turn begins. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.

abilities.name: Vanguard Predator
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1 as well.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Genestealers unit.

abilities.name: Scouts 8"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 8" before the first turn begins. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Gaze (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from the Hit roll of attacks made by that unit.

abilities.name: Vicious Insight
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

synapse.name: Synapse
synapse.description: A Tyranids unit is within Synapse Range when it is within 6" of one or more friendly SYNAPSE models. While within Synapse Range, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock test, take that test on 3D6 instead of 2D6.

shadow_in_the_warp.name: Shadow in the Warp
shadow_in_the_warp.description: Once per battle, in either player's Command phase, if one or more units with this ability are on the battlefield, every enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test. If an enemy unit is within 6" of one or more SYNAPSE units from your army, subtract 1 from that Battle-shock test.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword.
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
